message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds of inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. Let's split things a bit more evenly this time, with a slight advantage for me to compensate for the inflation.
Bob, inflation is eating away at our potential gains. I'm willing to be slightly more generous this round. Let's end this now and split it 55/45 in my favor.
